page.title: 04FISHING
page.content: BEADNELL HARBOUR. 4 Fishing cobles,8 Fishermen. 4 small boats for salmon fishing April- June : Crab fishing,average catch 30 st.Price Â£3 per stone. June- August: Salmon & Sea-Trout. License Â£400 from Northumberland Water Authority. Average catch 12 fish,weight 90 lbs. Price Â£1.40- Â£3.00 per lb. Sept.-Jan. :Lobster fishing. Average catch 50lb,price Â£3.00 per lb. Feb.-April :A few crabs and lobsters, often bad weather,boats overhauled & painted. Harbour owned by Fishermen's Society. 5p in the pound of each boats catch goes to this society for upkeep. The harbour has to be dredged each year ,cost Â£700 + other repairs.
